meanings.definition: To remove lice from (a person, animal, or place).
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian deloused the stray cat to make it healthy.
meanings.sent2: After the camping trip, they deloused their sleeping bags to prevent any infestations.
meanings.sent3: The school janitor deloused the old costumes for the upcoming play.
meanings.sent4: She deloused her thoughts of negativity to embrace a more positive outlook.
meanings.sent5: The gardener deloused the rose bushes to ensure they bloomed beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The clean sheets felt deloused and fresh after being washed.
meanings.sent2: The shelter adopted out only deloused pets to ensure a healthy environment.
meanings.sent3: The newly renovated cabin was not only cozy but also deloused for comfort.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt deloused from worries after a relaxing day at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The deloused dog happily wagged its tail, enjoying its newfound cleanliness.
